attributes.action: Allow immigrants that have lived in UK for more then 15 years permanent stay.
attributes.additional_details:
I'm a uk born citizen.
My partner has been living in the UK for 15 years. 
We have had an Islamic marriage.
We are not allowed to have a civil ceremony
attributes.background: I'm a British citizen and I want the freedom to be with my partner who doesn't have the right to reside in the UK. We have filed a case. I work full time and support my partner and myself. All i want is to live in peace with my partner.
